p: The levels of different biochemical markers i.e. (ALT, AST and ALP) and total direct Bilirubin in the blood serum of trial animals were assessed. It was observed that after administration of CCl 4, intensities of various parameters were increased ( Table 5). While by the consumption of plant drug, ranges of enzymes and Bilirubin became normal and significant results were noted for 300Â mg/kg b.w of methanol flower extracts. The effects of flower extracts on hepatic enzymes such as CAT, SOD, GPx and total proteins were also evaluated ( Table 6).
